name: Super Space Boy
description:
The most fun you'll have going UP!

They have come to our Solar System for one purpose…. The elimination of all happiness! It's up to you, Space Boy, to save us….Save the Universe by jumping on your Space balloon.

  • Multiple objectives in every level to earn bonus points
  • Each level increases in obstacles and difficulty
  • Go to the upgrade screen to increase your abilities
  • Every level has bosses to conquer
    • A simple game, keep Super Space Boy bouncing on the balloon, while making sure the balloon does not deflate. Collect coins and complete objectives.

    On the Apple Store:
